Package de.arnomann.martin.blobby.core

Class BlobbyEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arnomann.martin.blobby.core.BlobbyEngine
  • public final class BlobbyEngine
extends Object
    The main class of the engine.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static void run​(RunConfigurations runConfig,
                       String[] arguments)
        Starts the engine.
        Parameters:
        runConfig - the configuration for running.
        arguments - the console arguments.

      • instantiateEntity

        public static Entity instantiateEntity​(String classname,
                                       org.joml.Vector2d position,
                                       ITexture texture,
                                       Map<String,​Object> properties)
                                throws Exception
        Creates a new entity.
        Parameters:
        classname - the classname of the entity (as defined in the bin/entities.json file).
        position - the position where the entity is created.
        texture - the texture of the entity (it is possible that the entity doesn't use this texture).
        properties - the entity properties.
        Returns:
        the created entity.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the entity class is not found, there is no valid constructor or the constructor couldn't be called.

      • loadJSON

        public static org.json.JSONObject loadJSON​(File path)
        Loads a JSON from a file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the JSON file.
        Returns:
        the loaded JSON.

      • isTransitioningBetweenScreens

        public static boolean isTransitioningBetweenScreens()
        Returns whether we are transitioning between to screens or not.
        Returns:
        true if the game is transitioning between two screens, false otherwise.

      • unitMultiplier

        public static double unitMultiplier()
        Returns the unit multiplier. Every world position is multiplied by this to get the screen position.
        Returns:
        the unit multiplier.

      • debugMode

        public static void debugMode()
        Enables the debug mode.

        Returns:
        the screen.

      • loadTexture

        public static ITexture loadTexture​(String filename)
        Loads a texture from a path.
        Parameters:
        filename - the texture path.
        Returns:
        the texture.

      • getTexture

        public static ITexture getTexture​(String name)
        Gets a texture from a path. Loads the texture only if it hasn't been loaded yet.
        Parameters:
        name - the path to the texture.
        Returns:
        the texture.

      • getTextureWithoutCaching

        public static ITexture getTextureWithoutCaching​(String filename)
        Loads a texture from a path. DOES NOT cache it.
        Parameters:
        filename - the path of the texture.
        Returns:
        the texture.

      • getLogger
